attributes.action: allow Harrow Skatepark to continue without fear of demolition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The skatepark will be lost if we don’t act NOW.
Harrow skatepark, that fantastic survivor of the 1970’s is due to
be demolished. If Harrow Council’s plans go ahead, it will be lost
before the summer of 2008, as a new leisure centre is to be built
where it stands. We are convinced that there is room for the new
centre and the skatepark to exist side by side.
It has been a breeding ground for talent for nearly thirty
years and must be left for us to enjoy for many years to come.
There’s no time to lose.
If we act now, we can save our skatepark. THANK YOU!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
